original_text: These Jews here have heard about what you teach Jewish people in other countries. They think that you say to them, “You do not need to obey the Law of Moses any longer. You do not need to circumcise your children. You do not need to live in the way that Jewish people usually live.”
korean_text: 네가 이방에 있는 모든 유대인을 가르치되 모세를 배반하고 아들들에게 할례를 행하지 말고 또 관습을 지키지 말라 한다 함을 그들이 들었도다

sentences.original_text: These Jews here have heard about what you teach
sentences.korean_translation: 이곳에 있는 유대인들이 당신이 가르치는 내용에 대해 들었습니다

sentences.original_text: what you teach Jewish people in other countries
sentences.korean_translation: 당신이 다른 나라의 유대인들에게 가르치는 것

sentences.original_text: They think that you say to them
You do not need to obey the Law of Moses any longer
sentences.korean_translation: 더 이상 모세의 율법을 순종할 필요가 없다

sentences.original_text: You do not need to circumcise your children
You do not need to live in the way
